original: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /üîΩsa h'a dza g'i ti /
analyzed: @1b # // rgya gar skad du / sa h'a dza g'i ti /

original: bla ma dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bla ma dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: stong pa'i nags las me tog rab rgyas pa //
analyzed: stong pa'i nags las me tog rab rgyas pa //
translated: From the empty forest, the flowers fully bloom.

original: me tog gcig la kha dog sna tshogs te //
analyzed: me tog gcig la kha dog sna tshogs te //
translated: In a single flower, various colors.

original: dpe med ma tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal //
analyzed: dpe med ma tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal //
translated: When the incomparable flower grows, it conquers the directions.üîΩTake the priceless flower,

original: rin thang med pa'i me tog longs shig dang // de la rtsa ba med cing yal 'dab med //
analyzed: rin thang med pa'i me tog longs shig dang // de la rtsa ba med cing yal 'dab med //
translated: which has no root or branches.

original: grogs dag ser kha bzang po'i phyogs rgyal ltos //
analyzed: grogs dag ser kha bzang po'i phyogs rgyal ltos //
translated: Friends, look at the excellent golden direction that conquers.

original: dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal //
analyzed: dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal //
translated: When the incomparable flower grows, it conquers the directions.üîΩTake the priceless flower,

original: rin thang med pa'i me tog longs shig dang // ge sar blangs pas sgyu 'phrul mkhan po yin //
analyzed: rin thang med pa'i me tog longs shig dang // ge sar blangs pas sgyu 'phrul mkhan po yin //
translated: and by plucking the pistils, you are a magician.

original: rdo rje dbang phyug chos kyi dbyings la mchod //
analyzed: rdo rje dbang phyug chos kyi dbyings la mchod //
translated: The vajra lord makes offerings to the dharmadhatu.

original: dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal //
analyzed: dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal //
translated: When the incomparable flower grows, it conquers the directions.üîΩTake the priceless flower,

original: rin thang med pa'i me tog longs shig dang // mchog dang dga' bral rnam par brtags te zung //
analyzed: rin thang med pa'i me tog longs shig dang // mchog dang dga' bral rnam par brtags te zung //
translated: and having examined the supreme and the separation from joy, take it.

original: bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la gus pas mchod //
analyzed: bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la gus pas mchod //
translated: I respectfully make offerings at the feet of the sublime guru.

original: dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal //
analyzed: dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal //
translated: If a flower without equal grows, it will conquer the directions.üîΩTake the flower of priceless value,

original: rin thang med pa'i me tog longs shig dang // rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug sh'anta de bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rin thang med pa'i me tog longs shig dang // rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug sh'anta de bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: and the lord of yogis, Shantarakshita, is finished.

original: // / @2a * //  bla ma dhi ri shr'i dzny'a na'i zhabs dang / lo ts'a ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur /
analyzed: // / @2a * //  bla ma dhi ri shr'i dzny'a na'i zhabs dang / lo ts'a ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur /
translated: By the feet of the guru Dhiri Shrijnana and the translator Rma ban Chos 'bar.
